output_questions.question: This is a long text that will be clipped.
output_questions.output: This is a long text that will be clipped.
output_questions.explanation: The text that doesn't fit inside the box is not visible due to `overflow: hidden`.

output_questions.question: Scroll to see more content in this div.
output_questions.output: Scroll to see more content in this div.
output_questions.explanation: Scrollbars are always visible, even if not needed.

output_questions.question: Auto overflow example.
output_questions.output: Auto overflow example.
output_questions.explanation: Scrollbars show up only if the content overflows the box.

output_questions.question: Some overflowing text here.
output_questions.output: Some overflowing text here.
output_questions.explanation: Overflowing content is visible outside the box. No clipping or scrollbars.

output_questions.question: This text is very long horizontally but not tall.
output_questions.output: This text is very long horizontally but not tall.
output_questions.explanation: Horizontal scrolling is enabled, vertical overflow is hidden.

output_questions.question:
Line1
Line2
Line3
Line4
output_questions.explanation: Vertical scrollbar appears due to vertical overflow.

output_questions.question: This content will be clipped.
output_questions.output: This content will be clipped.
output_questions.explanation: `overflow: clip` behaves like `hidden` but does not add scrollbars even if content is cut off.

output_questions.question: This is a wide text for x-overflow.
output_questions.output: This is a wide text for x-overflow.
output_questions.explanation: Horizontal scroll appears if text is too wide, but vertical overflow is visible.

output_questions.question: Long single line that causes horizontal scroll.
output_questions.output: Long single line that causes horizontal scroll.
output_questions.explanation: Long single-line text causes a horizontal scrollbar due to `white-space: nowrap`.

output_questions.question: Short
output_questions.explanation: No scrollbars appear if content fits; scrollbars are only added if needed.

output_questions.question:
Visible
Hidden
output_questions.explanation: If the combined height exceeds 40px, any extra content is hidden.

output_questions.question: A lot of visible overflowing content that will spill outside.
output_questions.output: A lot of visible overflowing content that will spill outside.
output_questions.explanation: Overflowing content is visible outside the box.

One
Two
Three
Four
output_questions.explanation: Vertical scrollbar appears only if the content overflows vertically.

output_questions.question: Hidden overflow
output_questions.output: Hidden overflow
output_questions.explanation: Any text that exceeds the box's bounds is not displayed.

output_questions.question: A really long line that will trigger horizontal scroll and possibly vertical scroll as well.
output_questions.output: A really long line that will trigger horizontal scroll and possibly vertical scroll as well.
output_questions.explanation: Horizontal scrollbar is always visible; vertical appears if content is too tall.
